attributes.action: Ban Easter Trading & keep Easter Sunday a Family Day
attributes.additional_details:
Ban all businesses from opening
Currently the news tells us business is campaigning to open on Easter Sunday starting with garden centres this will just be the start!
Keep Easter Sunday as a family day of which there are not many left!
As businesses increase working hours for financial benefit families suffer loosing valuable family time which keeps family s together.
Gone are the family sundays where most people could be together strengthening the family bond, great for business supposedly although people only have so much to spend!
We now have bank holidays although most businesses can work then so family's are still split with many having to work, which leaves us with Christmas day!  2 days a year is that really too much to ask for family time where the whole family can get together without the family being split because some of the family cant get the day off and have to work!
